attributes.action: find some way in which to recognise Harry Patch and Henry Allingham WW1 survivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: harry patch and henry allingham are britains only surviving veterans of the great war, at the moment they are living history, and sadly when they pass away, they and ww1 will become history.  they gave their youth so that we can be free. france has bestowed a great honour on them, yet our government has done nothing. before it is too late, they should get something, sooner rather than later!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
